description:
Also exist for W10 and android.
Should allow to choose the audio device instead of the default one.
Not impressed with the Linux version. DAB+ reception cuts out after 2 seconds on good signal. Known linux bug not yet addressed. I have it on a Win10 PC and it is fine.
Used on ubuntu with zero issues, all features work. Happy to see heaps of DAB+ stations all tune in 100% perfectly using generic RTL device.

Have used this for some time now to listen to audio broadcasts on the DAB+ frequency's, works after setting it to my RTL-SDR hardware. Also has a built-in webserver to serve the broadcasts on your network.
summary: Nice radio app for receiving DAB+ audio

description:
At home I often use bluetooth headset (with ANC). So I was searching a long time for buying a good, small dab+ radio. Nearly all of them can NOT transmit vom the radio to bluetooth headset, only the other direction (from phone to radio). Then I found one (from HAMA), but it costs 250 €. Too expensive. - The much cheaper solution is my computer, a SDR USB-Stick and this very good software. Thanks to all!

It would be great if there was a button for escaping from commercials (for a user defined time) to another channel ... and automatically back.

(Tuxedo OS 3, SDR USB Stick RTL2832)
summary: BT-TX to BT headset - cheap solution

description: Ein super praktisches Programm, das genau das tut was es verspricht. Es läuft auch wesentlich stabiler als die originale Windows-Software meines Sticks. Großes Lob an die Entwickler, ihr habt meine gute Laune gerettet!
Tja, der RTL-SDR-Stick wurde sofort erkannt und es wurden Sender trotz schlechter Antenne gefunden. Unter Ubuntu 20.04.2 funktioniert das Programm.

Funktioniert in meinem neuesten Ubuntu leider nicht. Sobald ich den Suchlauf starte crasht das Programm obwohl der Expertenmodus eingestellt ist.
Funktioniert aber unter Windows 10 Pro wunderbar!
Leider stürzt das Programm beim Suchlauf ab, es soll an PulseAudio liegen…
Testé sur les multiplex de Bordeaux. Vraiment très simple d'utilisation.
Установил приложение, но ни одной радиостанции нет.
